Welcome! This is my portfolio repository showcasing projects and skills.

> **NOTICE:** This repository is for portfolio/demo purposes only. You may view and learn from the code, but do not copy, modify, redistribute, or use it in any project without permission.
> Contact: hello@justinnn.dev

## Key Features
- Responsive Design (desktop/tablet/mobile)
- Modern UI with Vue.js & Tailwind CSS
- Project Showcase
- Experience Overview
- Contact Form
- SEO Optimized
- Automated Deployment with GitHub Actions

## Prerequisites
- Node.js >=18.18 ([nodejs.org](https://nodejs.org/))
- Git ([git-scm.com](https://git-scm.com/))
- npm/pnpm/yarn/bun

## Setup
1. Clone the repo:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/Jqstln/portfolio.git
cd portfolio
```
2. Install dependencies:
```bash
npm install # or any choice of package manager (e.g., pnpm, yarn, or bun)
```
3. Start the development server:
```bash
npm run dev
```
Visit then ``http://localhost:3000`` to view the portfolio.
